title: Ivanti Avalanche Filestore Management Arbitrary File Upload Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Ivanti Avalanche. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the FileStoreConfig app. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can allow the upload of arbitrary files. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
timeline:
2021-06-30 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-11-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2022-05-26 - Advisory Updated
